document_data.name: Amlithor Harlguss
document_data.mainbody: '''Amlithor Harlguss''' was a male human of the city of [[Tantras]] in [[the Vast]]. He was a leader of the [[Grayclaws]] [[thieves]]' [[guild]] around [[1358 DR]].
